cause.description:
Do you like taking a crap in a bathroom with bugs? I dont. Do you like pissing in a clogged toilet? I dont. I like white bathrooms with no bugs. Always kept clean. Ya. Thats nice. Dont get anxious about where your gonna take u next shit and piss!
1. It will allow everyone to feel confortable in the bathroom.
2. It will give MCP a good reputation for bathrooms!
3. It will be nice.
cause.mission: clean the bathrooms of Montclair Prep!
cause.name: MCP Bathroom Reconstruction
